content:
# The recipe for crafting iron gear wheels requires 2 iron plates. Since I have 9 iron plates in my inventory, I can proceed to craft multiple iron gear wheels.
# 
# I will craft 4 iron gear wheels to ensure I have enough for future needs.

craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=4)  # Crafting 4 iron gear wheels. 
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Displaying the updated inventory after crafting.
